title: Wipe Out the Jargon
creator_credit: Seven Dimensions, Eve Ash and Ted Robinson
brief_description: The characters in this madcap program (a pen, a pencil and liquid paper) spearhead an attack on jargon and woolly-writing. They demonstrate how to improve letter and report writing skills by isolating the four principles of clear, well structured letters and reports: Plan, Be Clear, Order, Evaluate. Short notes accompany the program.
